TopicTitle: How to Record and Produce KSP Videos For Free

Articles.Content: I recently created a video on my channel on three ways to record games for free, but this also works with KSP. I show off ezvid, Open Broadcaster Software, and CamStudio. Use whichever one works best for you.
That's great! Might make some random videos now! Thanks!

I just found out if you have a recent nVidia card, you can install and use "ShadowPlay" for free. It has the added benefit of causing very little frame rate drop (~10%).
